markdown.headingText: Asegurar idioma español para los meses
markdown.markdown:
```{r, include=FALSE} knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE, fig.path = "figures/") locales <- c("es_ES.UTF-8", "Spanish_Spain.1252", "es_ES") for (loc in locales) { res <- try(Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME", loc), silent = TRUE) if (!inherits(res, "try-error") && !is.na(res)) break } ``` ```{r, include=FALSE} # Cargar entorno y configuraciones source("code/00_setup.R") source("code/01_theme.R") source("code/02_datos.R") ``` ```{r, include=FALSE} df_idv<-df %>% group_by(mes, idv_group) %>% tally(wt = ponde_mes_ajustada) %>% mutate(perc = round((n / sum(n) * 100), 1)) %>% filter(idv_group %in% c("PSOE", "PP", "Vox", "Sumar", "Podemos")) ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE} # ================================ # GRÁFICO INTERACTIVO ggiraph # ================================ p_idv <- ggplot(df_idv, aes( x = mes, y = perc, color = idv_group, group = idv_group )) + # Línea estética (sin tooltip, porque el tooltip por línea es único por grupo) geom_line_interactive(linewidth = .8) + # PUNTOS INVISIBLES: capturan el hover por mes (tooltip correcto) pero no se ven geom_point_interactive( data = df_idv, aes( x = mes, y = perc, color = idv_group, tooltip = paste0( "", idv_group, "
", format(mes, "%B %Y", locale = "es_ES.UTF-8"), ": ", perc, "%" ) ), size = 7, alpha = 0, show.legend = FALSE, inherit.aes = FALSE ) + # ÚLTIMO PUNTO VISIBLE (con tooltip) geom_point_interactive( data = ultimo_por_grupo(df_idv, idv_group, mes), aes( x = mes, y = perc, color = idv_group, tooltip = paste0( "", idv_group, "
", format(mes, "%B %Y", locale = "es_ES.UTF-8"), ": ", perc, "%" ) ), size = 3, inherit.aes = FALSE ) + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "black", linewidth = .2) + scale_x_date(labels = label_date("%b %y", locale = "es_ES")) + scale_color_manual(values = colores_partidos) + theme_minimal() + labs( subtitle = "Intención de voto a PSOE, PP, Vox, Sumar y Podemos" ) + theme_1 # Render condicional if (knitr::is_html_output()) { girafe( ggobj = p_idv, options = list( # Hover más “generoso” para móvil y ratón opts_hover(css = "stroke-width:3px;opacity:0.9;"), opts_tooltip(css = "background:white;color:black;padding:6px; border-radius:6px;box-shadow:0px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); font-family:Roboto;font-size:13px;"), opts_toolbar(saveaspng = TRUE) ) ) } else { dir.create("figures", showWarnings = FALSE) static_plot_path <- file.path("figures", "p_idv_static.png") ggsave(static_plot_path, plot = p_idv, width = 8, height = 5, dpi = 300) Sys.sleep(1) knitr::include_graphics(static_plot_path) } ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE} # ================================ # RESUMEN AUTOMÁTICO # ================================ resumen <- df_idv %>% group_by(idv_group) %>% summarise( mes_ini = min(mes, na.rm = TRUE), perc_ini = perc[which.min(mes)], mes_fin = max(mes, na.rm = TRUE), perc_fin = perc[which.max(mes)], mes_min = mes[which.min(perc)], perc_min = min(perc, na.rm = TRUE), mes_max = mes[which.max(perc)], perc_max = max(perc, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop" ) %>% mutate( diff = round(perc_fin - perc_ini, 1), color = case_when( idv_group == "PSOE" ~ "#E3001B", idv_group == "PP" ~ "#1d4184", idv_group == "Vox" ~ "#5BC035", idv_group == "Sumar" ~ "#F57BA4", idv_group == "Podemos" ~ "#662D91" ), texto = glue( "
  • {idv_group}: ", "En {format(mes_ini, '%B de %Y', locale='es_ES.UTF-8')} un {perc_ini}% afirmaba que les votaría, ", "hoy lo hace un {perc_fin}%, una diferencia de {diff} puntos. ", "El dato más bajo fue {perc_min}% en {format(mes_min, '%B de %Y', locale='es_ES.UTF-8')}, ", "y el más alto {perc_max}% en {format(mes_max, '%B de %Y', locale='es_ES.UTF-8')}.
    • " ) ) ``` ```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE} cat("
    ") cat("
      ") cat(paste(resumen$texto, collapse = "\n")) cat("
    ") ```
